page.title: 04LIFE IN LIVERPOOL,1985
page.content: MY NAME IS MARRIANE HISLOP.IN FIVE HUNDRED YEARS TIME OR MORE PEOPLE MIGHT LIKE TO KNOW HOW WE LIVE SO I WILL TELL YOU ABOUT MYSELF AND HOW I LIVE.{I AM TEN TEARS OLD AND I GO TO {SCHOOL.I WILL MOVE FROM JUNIOR TO {SECONDARY SCHOOL NEXT YEAR AND WILL {REMAIN IN SCHOOL UNTIL THE AGE OF {ABOUT SIXTEEN.I}STARTED NURSERY SCHOOL WHEN I WAS THREE.IN SCHOOL WE WEAR A UNIFORM WHICH IS A GREY SKIRT,WHITE SHIRT,SILVER AND RED TIE AND A GREY JUMPER.WHEN I AM NOT IN SCHOOL I LIKE TO PLAY IN OUR STREET OR IN THE PARK.THERE ARE LOTS AND LOTS OF HOUSES IN NORRIS GREEN AND THERE ARE SOME SHOPS AND SCHOOLS.MY FAVOURITE DRINK IS ORANGE JUICE AND MY FAVOURITE SWEETS ARE MARS BARS.
